mapper.insert: insert into TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA(id, train_data_id, train_data_name, train_data_url, train_data_path, train_data_type, add_time, TRAIN_DATA_FILE_NAME,TRAIN_COURSE_ID,ANSWER_ID) values (#{id},#{trainDataId},#{trainDataName},#{trainDataUrl}, #{trainDataPath},#{trainDataType},#{addTime},#{trainDataFileName},#{trainCourseId},#{answerId})
mapper.update:
update TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA
train_data_id = #{trainDataId},
train_data_name = #{trainDataName},
train_data_url = #{trainDataUrl},
train_data_path = #{trainDataPath},
train_data_type = #{trainDataType},
TRAIN_DATA_FILE_NAME = #{trainDataFileName},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select ID,TRAIN_DATA_NAME,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ADD_TIME,TRAIN_DATA_URL,ANSWER_ID,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID,TRAIN_COURSE_NAME from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE
and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE.TRAIN_COURSE_ID
and TRAIN_DATA_NAME like '%'||#{trainDataName}||'%'

select TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ID,TRAIN_DATA_NAME,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ADD_TIME,TRAIN_DATA_URL,ANSWER_ID, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID,TRAIN_COURSE_NAME from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE,user_train_data_rela dr where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE.TRAIN_COURSE_ID and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.id = dr.data_id and dr.user_id = #{userId}

select TRAIN_DATA_URL,TRAIN_ANSWER_URL,TRAIN_SHEET_URL from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER,USER_TRAIN_DATA_RELA,TF_EL_ANSWER_SHEET where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ANSWER_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.ANSWER_ID and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ID = DATA_ID and USER_TRAIN_DATA_RELA.ANSWER_SHEET_ID = TF_EL_ANSWER_SHEET.ANSWER_SHEET_ID and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ID = #{id}
select id,train_data_name,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID,TRAIN_COURSE_NAME from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE.TRAIN_COURSE_ID

select TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.id, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.train_data_name, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.train_data_type, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.train_data_file_name, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.train_course_id, TRAIN_COURSE_NAME, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.answer_id, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.train_answer_type, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.train_data_file_name as trainAnswerFileName from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER,TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ANSWER_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.ANSWER_ID and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE.TRAIN_COURSE_ID and ID = #{id}
select TRAIN_DATA_NAME,count(USER_ID) as trainDataNum from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA td left join USER_TRAIN_DATA_RELA tdr on td.ID = tdr.DATA_ID group by TRAIN_DATA_NAME

select TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ID,TRAIN_DATA_NAME,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ADD_TIME,TRAIN_DATA_URL,ANSWER_ID, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID,TRAIN_COURSE_NAME from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE,user_train_data_rela dr
where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE.TRAIN_COURSE_ID and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.id = dr.data_id and dr.user_id = #{userId} and dr.ANSWER_SHEET_ID != '0'
